ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: PHO Center for Public Health - Skopje

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: PHO Center for Public Health - Skopje

LOCATION.P: PHO Centre for Public Health — Skopje, Nr. 18 Third Macedonian Brigade str., Skopje

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Detailed description of the subject of the public procurement contract and the required amounts is given in the part of Technical specifications, which is an integral part of the bidding documentation.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Purified water system with reverse osmosis
Qualitative / quantitative elemental analyzer based on light source from high frequency inductively coupled plasma with optical emission spectrometry ICP-OES

DEPOSITS_GUARANTEES_REQUIRED.P: Warrantee for quality performance of the contract in the amount of 10% of the Contract value.

MAIN_FINANCING_CONDITIONS.P: Grace period of 60 days from the signing of the contract. Payment of 18 equal monthly installments after the expiration of the grace period of 60 days.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: In order to demonstrate their status, the economic operator should submit the following documents:
— declaration by the economic operator that in the last 5 years he was not pronounced a verdict for participation in a criminal organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering,
— confirmation that it is not a subject to bankruptcy procedure by a competent Authority,
— confirmation that it is not a subject to bankruptcy procedure for winding by the competent Authority,
— confirmation of paid taxes, contributions and other public duties by the competent Authority of the country in which the economic operator is registered,

— certificate from the Registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal entities that it has not been imposed a minor penalty ban on participation in public bidding procedures, granting contracts and agreements for public private partnership,

— certificate from the Registry of penalties for crimes committed by legal entities that it has not been imposed a minor penalty — temporary or permanent prohibition for performing professional activity,
— confirmation that it has not imposed a sanction by verdict — prohibition on performing a profession, activity or duty, i.e. temporary prohibition for performing professional activity.
In order to prove the ability for performing professional activity, the economic operator should submit the following documents:

— in order to prove that it is able to perform a professional activity, the economic operator should submit a document for registered activity, as an evidence that it is registered as a natural or legal entity for performing the activity related to the subject of the Public procurement contract, or an evidence that it belongs to an appropriate professional association in compliance with the regulations of the country it is registered in.

EAF_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: No documents are required to prove the economic situation of the economic operator.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: No documents are required to prove the technical capacity of the economic operator.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: Contracting Authority will use an electronic bid as a final phase in the open procedure. Subject of the electronic bid is the total price, including all expenses and discounts and import duties, without VAT. The initial price of the electronic bid is the lowest price of the accepted offers submitted in the initial phase of the procedure. Invitations for the bid will be submitted in electronic form through ESPP after a full evaluation of the initial offers to all economical operators that have submitted acceptable offers in the first phase of the procedure and are registered in ESPP. The invitation for the bid will be electronically sent on email address of the contact person stated in the Form for offer which is previously registered in ESPP (https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk)
If there is only one offer, or one acceptable offer submitted, the electronic bid will not take place, and the Contracting Authority will invite the only bidder to submit a final price through ESPP.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: PHO Center for Public Health — Skopje (meeting room, first floor)

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: Authorized representatives of the economic operators of public opening must have an authorization signed by the authorized person of the economic operators at the public opening of tenders may attend any interested person. Only authorized representatives of the bidders may participate in the proceedings of a public bid opening by giving their comments in the minutes of the bid opening.

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: State commission for appeals on public procurements
State commission for appeals on public procurements
